Text: If only the movie was half as good. Thanks, MM. Just a shame it took 81 bad mirror masters to get a good one.

Ah. My first DD stories. 
Yet, as much as I love them, I swear this was the start of the - still ongoing - "How much more crap can we throw at DD's life" competition, with every new writer trying to make Matty Murdock more miserable.

Thanks.
